channel.title: Classification System on Documaster Noark5 API
channel.description: Recent content in Classification System on Documaster Noark5 API

item.title: Class
item.description: Overview Class (Klasse) is an entity representing a single concept instance part of a Classification System (Klassifikasjonssystem). Classes are classification criterias which greatly facilitates data retrieval and provides the required data structuring. Classes (Klasse) are associated to folders (Saksmapppe, Mappe, Moetomappe) or records (Journalpost, Basisregistrering, Moeteregistrering) and act as labels for those entities. Entity name in the API : Klasse. Being a core Noark5 model entity, Class (Klasse) is created/modified using the Transaction :: POST /transaction operation.
